entry.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] - vCenter major upgrade and ESXi upgrade
entry.content:
Apr 17, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 14, 14:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/04/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 28/04/2023 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere and Zerto will be inaccessible for 3 hours during the maintenance. Hosts will be rebooted, but there is no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service

entry.title: [RBX][Hosted Private cloud] - Storage Incident Notification
entry.content:
Apr 14, 07:48 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/04/2023 17:55 UTC
End Time : 13/04/2023 21:47 UTC
Root cause : Incident caused by a failure on a cooling module.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 13, 20:05 UTC
Identified - Root cause : Incident caused by a failure on a cooling module.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on this issue.

Apr 13, 18:37 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 13/04/2023 17:55 UTC
User impact : No access to storage cluster9714 in RBX2A.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2A
Ongoing Actions: Our technical teams are investigating on this issue.
Pools affected :
ssd-016193
ssd-016186
ssd-017861
ssd-016243
ssd-017863
ssd-017876
ssd-017877
ssd-017878

entry.title: [SBG3][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network & servers operation
entry.content:
Apr 12, 00:49 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Apr 11, 22:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 27, 20:35 UTC
Update - Below you can find the new dates of the current maintenance.

Start time : 11/04/2023 22:00 UTC
End time : 12/04/2023 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Our teams will carry out an update operation on storage equipment. This update will be performed first on the nodes in standby. Once the update is complete, a switchover will be performed to update the remaining devices. Expect a few seconds freeze of the inputs/outputs during the switchover
Service improvement : In order to maintain continuous improvement of our internal network infrastructure and to have a homogeneous park, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

Mar 24, 22:37 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/03/2023 22:00 UTC
End time : 30/03/2023 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Our teams will carry out an update operation on storage equipment. This update will be performed first on the nodes in standby.
